text: Jack Varaleau was a weightlifter from Canada. Jack competed at the 1948 Summer Olympics and the 1952 Summer Olympics. He was born on 22 May 1922 and died on 27 November 2004.Jack Varaleau == References == Category:1922 births Category:2004 deaths Category:Olympians for Canada Category:Canadian weightlifters Category:Sportspeople from Ontario
title: Jack Varaleau
